author: crossley
msg: Add list of important changes by generating from status.xml

author: jdcasey
msg: o Pressing [ENTER] at a plugin update prompt should result in the plugin being registered, as indicated by the prompt.
o Use CLI switch '--no-plugin-updates' to suppress usage of the plugin registry
o Use CLI switch '--update-plugins' to force updated/resolved plugin versions to be registered
o Neither of these has a short CLI option, since we're starting to run out of sensible char options for these types of things.

author: jdcasey
msg: Changing DefaultPluginManager to lookup a plugin's artifact from pluginRepositories, and changing the location of the super-pom's pluginRepository.
